Subject: Shadow copies and logs migration to the new AWS instance
Description:
Good afternoon!


The PrivatBank customer is migrating to the new EPP instance, but with the migration via the SystemBackup v2 option, it does not transfer copies and logs.
The customer can allocate an S3 Bucket to temporary move logs and copies there.

Could you please schedule the remote session to migrate shadow copies and logs?

What would the best option here to not lose logs and shadow copies?
What_We_Know__c:
25.03
- customer wants to migrate logs and shadows to a new server
- checking internally how it can be done

27. 03
- that unfortunately moving audit logs from one server to another can't be done
- scheduled a RS for 28.03

28.03
- told the customer in a RS that shadows can be downloaded only via Audit Log Backup

01.04
- the customer asked to keep the case open until they migrate

17.04
- followed up regarding the migration date
Next_Steps__c:
25.03
- check internally about log migration

27.03
- RS to take place on 28.03

01.04
- waiting on the customer to let us know when they migrate
Solution_Comment__c: The customer needs to migrate their server, but they don't have a timeline yet. They will open a ticket when the have the details.
